FixBathHouseDoors.Description: Allows player to enter either door at the bath house.

FixBathHouseTiles.Description: Removes the 'W' and 'M' from the bath house doors.

ReplaceGenderSymbols.Description: Changes the male and female gender symbols into a 1 and 2.

FixDialogues.Description: Changes most dialogues and events in the game to use noun/pronoun settings below.

FixOtherPlayers.Description: Changes multiplayer messages to use noun/pronoun settings below.

PronounsAndNounsConfiguration.Description: Values beyond this point will change the way the mod refers to you. These fields will accept ANY input (including blanks) and use that in place of the default values. Fields should be entered in all lowercase for best results with two exceptions: 1. Your pronouns specifically use (a) capital letter(s) -OR- 2. When specifically told to capitalize a letter in a Special Note.

SubjectivePronoun.Description: The subjective pronoun to use. Examples include: he, she, they, etc.

CapitalSubjectivePronoun.Description: The capitalized subjective pronoun to use. Examples include: He, She, They, etc. Special Note: The first letter should be capitalized.

CapitalSubjectivePronoun+Be.Description: Contraction of subjective pronoun and present simple tense of 'to be'. Examples: He's, She's, They're, etc. Special Note: The first letter should be capitalized.

CapitalSubjectivePronoun+Have.Description: Contraction of subjective pronoun and present simple tense of 'to have'. Examples: He's, She's, They've, etc. Special Note: The first letter should be capitalized.

ObjectivePronoun.Description: The objective pronoun to use. Examples: him, her, them, etc.

PossessivePronoun.Description: The possessive pronoun to use. Examples: his, her, their, etc.

Title.Description: The formal title you wish to go by. Examples: Ms., Mr., Mrs., Mx., Dr., Misc., etc. Special Note: The first letter should most likely be capitalized.

Adjective.Description: An adjective occasionally used to describe you. Examples: handsome, beautiful, gorgeous, etc.

SpouseNoun.Description: The noun which people will use to describe your marital status. Examples: husband, wife, spouse, partner, etc.

GenericNoun.Description: The noun used to refer to you as a person. Examples: man, guy, woman, girl, person, enby, etc.

AdultAntiquatedNoun.Description: The more antiquated noun some adults will use to refer to you. Examples: guy, gal, folk, etc.

AdultFamilialNoun.Description: The noun used by some adults signifying familial status. Examples: son, daughter, kid, etc.

ElderAntiquatedNoun.Description: The more antiquated noun some older adults will use to refer to you. Examples: lad, lass, kid, etc.

ElderInformalNoun.Description: The more informal noun some older adults will use to refer to you. Examples: son, hun, kid, etc.

ElderFamilialNoun.Description: The noun used by some older adults signifying familial status. Examples: son, daughter, child, etc.

ChildFamilialNoun.Description: The noun used by some children signifying familial status or familiarity. Examples: uncle, aunty, cousin, etc.

ServiceFormalNoun.Description: The noun used to refer to you by some in the customer service industry. Example: sir, miss, ma'am, esteemed customer, etc.

Entries.Event_Grave3: Why? I'm just as strong as you!$a#$b#I'm not some fragile princess.. I can take care of myself!$a#$b#I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!$8
Entries.summer_Tue4: You're an interesting {{GenericNoun}}, @. I'm glad you moved here.$h

Entries.Introduction: Oh, hey. So you're the new farmer, huh? Cool.#$e#I'll see you around.
Entries.Resort_Chair: Aren't you hot in that outfit? C'mon... It's the beach!
Entries.Tue: The beach is a cool place to hang out and soak up some rays.#e#You gotta spend some time in the sun or else you'll get all pale.#$e#Hey, do you wanna hang out with me at the beach some time?
Entries.Wed: Looks like a good day to play catch, huh?$u#$e#$q 5/6 Wed_01_old#I'd ask you to throw the ball around, but you don't really seem like the sports type.#$r 6 0 Wed_01_02#I'm fine just watching you from a distance.#$r 5 15 Wed_01_01#I want to play catch with you!#$r 5 0 Wed_01_03#(angry) What's that supposed to mean?
Entries.Fri: Hey, what's up farmer? Did you get new pants? You're doing something right.#e#Oh, I almost forgot! It's my day for doing push-ups!#e#Every time I do push-ups I try to do one more than last time. Pretty cool strategy, huh?
Entries.event_box3: ...Thanks, @.#$b#You've become my best friend in the whole town... #$b#Is that embarrassing to say?$l
Entries.summer_Mon: Hey farmer. You look a little burnt.#$e#The more I practice this summer, the easier it'll be for me to go pro.#$e#Then you'd be able to say you knew me once. Cool, huh?
Entries.summer_Wed: Hey farmer, I've got a question for you.#$b#$q 52/53 summer_Wed_01_old#Do you think I'll ever turn pro?#$r 52 30 summer_Wed_01_01#You're destined to be a sports legend#$r 52 0 summer_Wed_01_02#Maybe, if you practice a lot#$r 53 -50 summer_Wed_01_03#No, you'll most likely fail and become a salesman
Entries.summer_Wed_01_03: That's ridiculous. You're just jealous that I'm talented and popular and you're not.$a#$e#Get away from me.$a
Entries.summer_Thu: Hey, you must be getting pretty strong working on that farm all day.#$e#Maybe you'll reach my level some day. Something to look forward to, huh?#$e#Why do you have that look on your face?
Entries.fall_Wed: Hey, can I ask you something?#$e#$q 54/55 fall_Wed_01_old#What do you think about my haircut?#$r 54 30 fall_Wed_01_01#It looks very fashionable.#$r 55 -30 fall_Wed_01_02#It looks like some kind of fungal growth.

Entries.summer_Sun6: Hi, @! We've become decent friends, haven't we?$h#$e#I'm glad.$h

Entries.fall_Sat_inlaw_Alex: Oh, hello my dear. I think of you as my own grand{{ElderFamilialNoun}} now.$h

Entries.Wed_inlaw_Alex: You're part of the family, now. I'm glad that my grandson found such a nice {{SpouseNoun}}.
Entries.Wed10_inlaw_Alex: You're part of the family, now... and I couldn't be more proud.
Entries.Thu: I can't talk right now, {{ElderInformalNoun}}.#$e#My favorite program is on.
Entries.Fri10: You know, I really have been a grumpy old man to everyone. But now I feel like I'm softening up like an old ripe fruit. Hehe!$h#$e#Take care, {{ElderInformalNoun}}.

Entries.Introduction: Oh... You're that new farmer, or whatever. Aren't you?#$e#Huh? Oh... I'm Haley.#$e#Hmm... If it weren't for those horrendous clothes you might actually be cute.
Entries.Tue: Nice shoes.#$b#Are those made out of plastic?#$e#I'm bored.

Entries.Mon4: Hi, {{Title}} @.#$e#It's fun to live on a farm.$h
Entries.Sat8: You're always so nice to me, {{Title}} @.#$h#$e#Grown-ups are usually mean and boring, but you're different.

Entries.Mon: I love animals, {{Title}} @. If you treat yours well I'm sure we'll become good friends!

Entries.Rainy_Night_3: The rain makes our home seem so cozy.$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: I'm glad you're home.#$e#I get lonely at night...$s#$e#...$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_Alex: My arms feel a little restless... How about a nice, deep massage?$l
Entries.Indoor_Night_Elliott: #$c .5#You always smell so good after a day of hard work. Like a cinnamon leaf floating in the summer breeze.#$e#Come here, let me massage your back. You look tense.$l

Entries.Rainy_Night_5: Have you been working hard? You look cute when you're a little exhausted.$h

Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Ahh... there's nothing like a good night's sleep next to my {{SpouseNoun}}!$h
Entries.Outdoor_3: Look at us, with our little farm. We make a cute couple.$h
Entries.Good_1: You're really {{Adjective}}... have I told you that?$l

Entries.Rainy_Night_0: Good evening. Did you have a productive day, @?
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: My skill with words is unmatched, yet I can't find the way to properly describe your allure.$l
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: From the brightest winter star, to the shimmer of an iridium vein... nothing can compare to you.$l
Entries.Good_3: You're irresistible today. I can't keep my eyes off you.$l
Oh, my... you look wonderful today.$l
Wow, you look full of energy today!$l

Entries.Good_4: For a while there I was considering building a robotic {{SpouseNoun}}. But you're a lot more fun!$h

Entries.Good_3: Wow, you look really {{Adjective}} today. Did you do something different with your hair?$l
Wow, you look really {{Adjective}} today! Did you do something new with your hair?$l

Entries.MovieInvitation: Date night with ol' Pam, huh? Hah!$h#$b#Sure thing, kid... I'll see you there.
Entries.summer_Tue2: Oh, it's {{Title}} @.#$e#Do you need my help or something?
Entries.summer_Fri: ...Yeah?#$e#You're a fine lookin' young {{AdultAntiquatedNoun}}. Why're you wastin' your time talkin' to an old girl like me?

Entries.event_pool4: ...Oh, @. I thought you did, but I wasn't sure.$6#$b#You look so {{Adjective}} tonight... I... *gasp*$6

Entries.Introduction: Hey, it's {{Title}} @, the new farmer! I'm Pierre, owner of the local general store.#$b#If you're looking for seeds, my shop is the place to go. I'll also buy produce from you for a good price!#$e#A little agriculture could really inject new life into the local economy!
Entries.Mon_inlaw_Abigail: Hello, {{Title}}- er... I guess you're my {{AdultFamilialNoun}} now, huh?$s
Entries.Thu2: I really do appreciate your business, {{Title}} @. I've been having a harder and harder time turning a decent profit.

Entries.Wed10: @. Hey... I just wanted to say... You look nice today.$l

Entries.Tue6: I like your new boots!$h#$e#Do you want to hang out for a while?
Entries.event_garage3: There's no need to worry... I'll make sure you're safe.$8

Entries.Tue6: Can you keep a secret, {{Title}} @?$u#$b#I wanna marry Miss Penny when I grow up.#$e#Just don't tell her, okay?$u
Entries.Sun10: Hi {{ChildFamilialNoun}} @!#$e#Don't tell Mom... but you're my favorite grown-up.$h

Entries.accept_869: Ah... That's the perfect bait for a catfish I've been tryin' to catch!#$b#Here, let me trade you this for it. I'm not sure what it is, but it washed up on the beach not too long ago.#$b#Somethin' tells me you could use it, {{ElderAntiquatedNoun}}.
Entries.FullCrabPond: *sniff*... Ah... That old familiar scent. You've been raisin' crabs, haven't ya?#$b#Yer a {{GenericNoun}} after me own heart, @. Hah!$h#$b#Here, take this. I found it on the beach... Been savin' it fer a special occasion. It's not every day I discover a fellow crab enthusiast! [797]
Entries.MovieInvitation: Ah... a movie. That's kind of ye, {{ElderAntiquatedNoun}}#$b#I'll just finish me pipe, and head over.
Entries.Mon: Ahoy there, {{ElderAntiquatedNoun}}.#$b#Looks like decent weather for fishing, eh?

Entries.Island_willy_rescue: Are you okay? I found you washed up on the shore, {{ElderAntiquatedNoun}}.$s#$b#You really had me worried... I thought you were a goner! Be a little more careful out there...$s#$b#The island can be a dangerous place.
Entries.Morris_CommunityDevelopmentForm_PlayerMa: $q -1 -1#I've got the Joja Community Development Form right here for you, {{ServiceFormalNoun}}. Care to take a look?#$r -1 -1 Yes#Yes#$r -1 -1 No#No
Entries.Morris_CommunityDevelopmentForm_PlayerFe: $q -1 -1#I've got the Joja Community Development Form right here for you, {{ServiceFormalNoun}}. Care to take a look?#$r -1 -1 Yes#Yes#$r -1 -1 No#No
Entries.Mines_PlayerKilled_Spouse_PlayerMale: You were gone so long I started to get worried about you! I almost had a heart attack when I saw your limp body...$s
Entries.Mines_PlayerKilled_Spouse_PlayerFemale: You were gone so long I started to get worried about you! I almost had a heart attack when I saw your limp body...$s

I thought, well, maybe you would bring me a cave carrot when you have the chance?#$b#There's no pressure... but if you want to, just swing by my house between 9:00 AM and 5:00 PM with a cave carrot. You'll make an old girl very happy. Bye."/pause 300/end dialogue Marnie "My goats go wild over cave carrot... I can't imagine why."

Entries.Event.cs.1014: Hey, sorry you had to get caught up in our awkward family stuff...
Entries.Event.cs.1308: You've done well, my child.#$b#%farm Farm has never looked better. It's an honor to the family name.#$b#Grandpa is pleased.#$b#I must return to the other world, now... but feel free to call on me again when you're ready.
Entries.Event.cs.1309: I'm so proud of you, my child!#$b#You've really turned the place around since we last spoke!#$b#You're a better farmer than I ever was, and you've brought great honor to the family name.#$b#I can feel it now... My spirit is finally put to rest. Bless you.

Entries.GrandpaStory.cs.12051: Dear {0},^^If you're reading this, you must be in dire need of a change.^^The same thing happened to me, long ago. I'd lost sight of what mattered most in life... real connections with other people and nature. So I dropped everything and moved to the place I truly belong.^^^I've enclosed the deed to that place... my pride and joy: {1} Farm. It's located in Stardew Valley, on the southern coast. It's the perfect place to start your new life.^^This was my most precious gift of all, and now it's yours. I know you'll honor the family name, my child. Good luck.^^Love, Grandpa^^P.S. If Lewis is still alive say hi to the old guy for me, will ya?
